title: Packers vs. Seahawks recap & Week 1 preview
itunes:title: Packers vs. Seahawks recap & Week 1 preview
description:
With the heroes all over the place -- Gregg Rosenthal and Chris Wesseling in studio, and Dan Hanzus live from Seattle -- we recap the Seahawks' season-kickoff win over the Packers and what it means for both teams moving forward. The guys then welcome in Marc Sessler and preview all remaining 15 games on the NFL Week 1 schedule. Plus, a shadowy league figure makes a quiet appearance and future Gregg talks to past Gregg.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
